name: Project Kennedy Google
description: A google.com which more closely follows the design styles that Project Kennedy attempted to achieve, as outlined by The Verge. It creates a very different user experience, which more closely follows a simple, but beautiful user experience.
additional_info:
The style right now is really really broken. It is nowhere near any kind of full release, although it has promise. I think.

Version 0.1: Initial release
Version 0.11: Made all fonts that aren't bold into weight:100
